apsimRegions.preprocess¶

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim¶

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.new_area(element, name='paddock', shortcut=None)¶

Creates a new area, or paddock.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.new_clock(simulation, start=None, end=None, shortcut=None)¶

Creates a new clock.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.new_crop(element, crop, shortcut=None)¶

Creates a new crop.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.new_document(version=None, name='')¶

Craetes a new root document. All inputs have to be strings.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.new_fertiliser(element, shortcut=None)¶

Creates a new fertiliser.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.new_folder(element, name='', shortcut=None)¶

Creates a new folder.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.new_graph(element, plotX='x', plotY='y', name='XY', seriestype='Solid line', pointtype='Circle', color=None, shortcut=None)¶

Creates a new graph.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.new_irrigation(element, name='Irrigation', automatic_irrigation='on', asw_depth='600', crit_fr_asw='0.5', irrigation_efficiency='1', irrigation_allocation='off', allocation='0', default_no3_conc='0.0', default_nh4_conc='0.0', default_cl_conc='0.0', shortcut=None)¶

Creates a new irrigation.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.new_management_rule(element, rulename, ruleType, shortcut)¶

Creates a new managment rule shortcut to name.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.new_metfile(simulation, path, name='met', shortcut=None)¶

Creates a new metfile.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.new_outputfile(element, outputVariables=[], outputEvents=[], name_outputfile='outputfile', shortcut=None)¶

Creates a new outputfile.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.new_simulation(doc, name=None, shortcut=None)¶

Creates a new simulation.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.new_soil(element, crop, soilName=None, shortcut=None)¶

Creates a new soil.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.new_summaryfile(simulation, path=None, shortcut=None)¶

Creates a new summary file.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.new_surfaceom(element, crop, name='surface organic matter', mass='1000.', cnr='80.0', cpr='', standing_fraction='0.0', shortcut=None)¶

Creates a new surface organic matter.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.new_tracker(element, trackerVariables=[], name='tracker', shortcut=None)¶

Creates a new tracker.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsim.save_file(doc, filename, outputFileDir)¶

Generates pretty apsim xml and saves file.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsimconfig¶

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsimconfig.new_apsim(outputFileDir, config)¶

Creates a new apsim file in directory outputFileDir writing the metFileDir to each file.

Parameters :

outputFileDir : string

path to save .apsim files to

config : Config object from fileio module

configuration settings for the run.
Returns :

Name of the .apsim file which was saved to specified directory :
apsimRegions.preprocess.apsimconfig.select_soil(gridpoint, crop, element, shortcutroot, soilLut, soilName)¶

Chooses soil to use based on grid cell.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsimconfig.setup_graph_options(element)¶

Sets up graphing options for all simulations.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsimconfig.setup_management_options(folder, crop, config, gridpoint, gridLut, shortcut, rulesList, soil)¶

Setup management rules based on grid cell.

REMEMBER: order matters!

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsimconfig.setup_met(met, metFileDir, gridpoint)¶

Returns a met filename for inclusion in .apsim file.

example item: ‘WRF_00979.met’.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsimconfig.setup_project(projectName)¶

Sets up project options for all simulations.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsimconfig.setup_shared_management_options(folder, crop, config, shortcut=None)¶

Sets up management options for all simulations.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsimconfig.setup_soils(element, soilDataPath)¶

Sets up soils for all simulations.

apsimRegions.preprocess.apsimRegions.preprocess¶

apsimRegions.preprocess.batch¶

apsimRegions.preprocess.batch.create_run_all_batchfile(outputDir, runs, experimentName)¶

Creates a windows batchfile that runs all the other previously created batchfiles in each run folder.

Parameters :

outputDir : string

directory where .bat files will be saved

runs : dictionary

the keys are run numbers and the values are the varibales

experimentName : string

name to save .bat file as
Returns :

Nothing :
apsimRegions.preprocess.batch.create_run_batchfile(runDir, apsimModelDir)¶

Creates a windows batch file to run apsim using ApsimRun.py.

Parameters :

runDir : string

directory where to save .bat file

apsimModelDir : string

directory of apsim model where ApsimRun.py is located
Returns :

Nothing :

apsimRegions.preprocess.mangementRules¶

apsimRegions.preprocess.managementRules.cotton_fixed_date_sowing_rule(folder, crop, name='Cotton fixed date sowing rule', shortcut=None, date='', density='10', depth='30', cultivar='siok', row_spacing='1000', occurrence='start_of_day')¶

Rule for sowing cotton on a fixed date.

apsimRegions.preprocess.managementRules.cotton_sowing_rule(folder, crop, name='Cotton sowing rule', shortcut=None, start_date='', end_date='', must_sow='yes', raincrit='30', rainnumdays='3', esw_amount='200', density='10', depth='30', cultivar='siok', row_spacing='1000', skiprow='0', occurrence='start_of_day')¶

Rule for sowing cotton in a date range.

apsimRegions.preprocess.managementRules.fertOnSoilNCriteria_rule(folder, name='FertOnSoilNCriteria', shortcut=None, FertAmtCriteria='50', FertDepthCriteria='75', FertDepth='50', FertAmt='25', FertType='urea_n')¶

Rule for when to apply fertilizer with Manager 2.

apsimRegions.preprocess.managementRules.harvest_on_fixed_date_rule(folder, crop, harvestDate='1-jan', name='End crop on a fixed date', shortcut=None)¶

Rule for harvesting on a fixed date.

Parameters :

folder : element tree object

node to attach rule to

crop : string

crop to harvest

harvestDate : string (dd-mmm)

(optional) date to harvest crop

name : string

(optional) name of component to display in APSIM gui

shortcut : string

(optional) shortcut to link to
Returns :

The management rule. :
apsimRegions.preprocess.managementRules.harvesting_rule(folder, crop, name='Harvesting rule', shortcut=None)¶

Rule for when to harvest the crop.

apsimRegions.preprocess.managementRules.irrigate_on_sw_deficit_rule(folder, name='irrigate at sw deficit', shortcut=None, trigger='50', occurrence='start_of_day')¶

Rule for when to irrigate, and under what conditions.

apsimRegions.preprocess.managementRules.reset_on_fixed_date(folder, crop, soilmodule, reset_date, name='Reset water, nitrogen and surfaceOM on fixed date', shortcut=None, surfaceommodule='surface organic matter', resetWater='yes', resetNitrogen='yes', resetSurfaceOM='yes', occurrence='start_of_day')¶

Resets water, nitrogen, and surfaceOM on a fixed date.

Returns :The management rule. :
apsimRegions.preprocess.managementRules.sowOnFixedDate_rule(folder, crop, name='Sow on a fixed date', shortcut=None, date='1-jan', density='10', depth='50', cultivar='', gclass='plant', row_spacing='500', occurrence='start_of_day')¶

Rule for sowing on fixed date.

apsimRegions.preprocess.managementRules.sowUsingAVariable_rule(folder, crop, name='Sow using a variable rule', shortcut=None, start_date='', end_date='', must_sow='yes', raincrit='30', rainnumdays='3', esw_amount='200', density='3', depth='50', cultivar='usa_18leaf', gclass='plant', row_spacing='250', occurrence='start_of_day')¶

Rule for sowing on a variable date.

apsimRegions.preprocess.managementRules.sowingFertiliser_rule(folder, name='Sowing fertiliser', shortcut=None, eventname='sowing', fertiliser='fertiliser', fert_amount_sow='150', fert_type_sow='urea_N')¶

Rule for when to apply fertilizer.

apsimRegions.preprocess.soils¶

apsimRegions.preprocess.soils.add_soils(element, filename)¶

Adds all soils in filename to element.

Parameters :

element : lxml element tree element

element to add soils to

filename : string

filename to parse
Returns :

Nothing :
